General.Name: Inly Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Inly Media Co., Ltd. provides advertising, brand marketing, effect marketing, e-commerce, social media marketing, data consulting, and operation services in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.
